roleset.name: go on a pleasure trip
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. Verbnet class weekend-56. Framenet class travel. Framed by Katie.

example.name: example with both args
example.text: Between tours, she junketed in Portugal.

roleset.name: provide or partake in a feast
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Created due to parallel expansion of propbank, verbnet, and sense groupings. Verbnet class dine-39.5. No framenet mapping. Framed by Katie.

example.name: feaster example
example.text: We junketed on oysters, pigeon breast, pineapple casserole, and potables of the widest miscellanies.
example.arg: on oysters, pigeon breast, pineapple casserole, and potables of the widest miscellanies.
